translations: v．泄露秘密，说漏嘴：无意中或故意地透露秘密或敏感信息。
· He blabbed our plans to the whole school.
他把我们的计划泄露给了整个学校。

sentences.sentence: Someone must have blabbed to the police.
sentences.translation: 一定有人向警方告密了。

sentences.sentence: He blabbed my confidences to every one.
sentences.translation: 他把我告诉他的知心话告诉了每个人。

sentences.sentence: Harry: You blabbed Quaid! You blabbed about Mars!
sentences.translation: 哈里：你泄密了奎德！你泄漏了火星的秘密！
